p: We used MAFFT v7.305b to align nucleotide E gene sequences for each strain before translating the aligned sequences (no frame-shift indels were present) ( Katoh and Standley, 2013). All maximum likelihood phylogenies were constructed with IQ-TREE version 1.6.8 and the GTR + I + G15 nucleotide substitution model ( Nguyen et al., 2015).
